info.title: Aspose Words for Cloud Web API
info.description:
Version of Aspose.Words: 17.9.0.0
Version of Aspose.Words.Cloud: 17.8.0.0
Build number: 1

get.summary: Export the document into the specified format.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The destination format.

parameters.name: outPath
parameters.description: Path to save result

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: File storage, which have to be used.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Original document folder.

parameters.name: loadEncoding
parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

parameters.name: fontsLocation
parameters.description: Folder in filestorage with custom fonts.

put.summary: Convert document from request content to format specified.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format to convert.

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: Converting document

parameters.name: outPath
parameters.description: Path for saving operation result to the local storage.

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: File storage, which have to be used.

parameters.name: fontsLocation
parameters.description: Folder in filestorage with custom fonts.

put.summary: Convert document to tiff with detailed settings and save result to storage.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The document name.

parameters.name: saveOptions
parameters.description: Tiff save options.

parameters.name: resultFile
parameters.description: The resulting file name.

parameters.name: useAntiAliasing
parameters.description: Use antialiasing flag.

parameters.name: useHighQualityRendering
parameters.description: Use high quality flag.

parameters.name: imageBrightness
parameters.description: Brightness for the generated images.

parameters.name: imageColorMode
parameters.description: Color mode for the generated images.

parameters.name: imageContrast
parameters.description: The contrast for the generated images.

parameters.name: numeralFormat
parameters.description: The images numeral format.

parameters.name: pageCount
parameters.description: Number of pages to render.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Page index to start rendering.

parameters.name: paperColor
parameters.description: Background image color.

parameters.name: pixelFormat
parameters.description: The pixel format of generated images.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: The resolution of generated images.

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: Zoom factor for generated images.

parameters.name: tiffCompression
parameters.description: The compression tipe.

parameters.name: dmlRenderingMode
parameters.description: Optional, default is Fallback.

parameters.name: dmlEffectsRenderingMode
parameters.description: Optional, default is Simplified.

parameters.name: tiffBinarizationMethod
parameters.description: Optional, Tiff binarization method, possible values are: FloydSteinbergDithering, Threshold.

parameters.name: zipOutput
parameters.description: Optional. A value determining zip output or not.

parameters.name: destFileName
parameters.description: Result name of the document after the operation. If this parameter is omitted then result of the operation will be saved as the source document.

parameters.name: storage
parameters.description: File storage, which have to be used.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Original document folder.

parameters.name: loadEncoding
parameters.description: Encoding that will be used to load an HTML (or TXT) document if the encoding is not specified in HTML.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for opening an encrypted document.

parameters.name: fontsLocation
parameters.description: Folder in filestorage with custom fonts.

TiffSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for tiff save options.

TiffBinarizationMethod.description: Specifies method used while converting images to 1 bpp format.

GraphicsQualityOptionsData.description: Allows to specify additional System.Drawing.Graphics quality options.

CompositingMode.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies how composited images are drawn to this Graphics.

CompositingQuality.description: Gets or sets the rendering quality of composited images drawn to this Graphics.

InterpolationMode.description: Gets or sets the interpolation mode associated with this Graphics.

SmoothingMode.description: Gets or sets the rendering quality for this Graphics.

StringFormat.description: Gets or sets text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.

TextRenderingHint.description: Gets or sets the rendering mode for text associated with this Graphics.

MetafileRenderingOptionsData.description: container class for options of metafile rendering

EmfPlusDualRenderingMode.description: Determines how EMF+ Dual metafiles should be rendered

RenderingMode.description: Determines how metafile images should be rendered

UseEmfEmbeddedToWmf.description: Determines how WMF metafiles with embedded EMF metafiles should be rendered

Alignment.description: Gets or sets horizontal alignment of the string.

FormatFlags.description: Gets or sets a System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags enumeration that contains formatting information.

HotkeyPrefix.description: Gets or sets the System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix object for this System.Drawing.StringFormat object.

LineAlignment.description: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the string.

Trimming.description: Gets or sets the System.Drawing.StringTrimming enumeration for this System.Drawing.StringFormat object.

AdditionalItems.description: Links to additional items (css, images etc).

FileLink.description: Provides information for the file link.

Href.description:
The "href" attribute contains the link's IRI. atom:link elements MUST
have an href attribute, whose value MUST be a IRI reference

Rel.description:
atom:link elements MAY have a "rel" attribute that indicates the link
relation type.  If the "rel" attribute is not present, the link
element MUST be interpreted as if the link relation type is "alternate".

Type.description:
On the link element, the "type" attribute's value is an advisory
media type: it is a hint about the type of the representation that is
expected to be returned when the value of the href attribute is
dereferenced.  Note that the type attribute does not override the
actual media type returned with the representation.

Title.description:
The "title" attribute conveys human-readable information about the
link.  The content of the "title" attribute is Language-Sensitive.

DocSaveOptionsData.description: container class for doc/dot save options

SaveRoutingSlip.description: Determine whether or not save RoutingSlip data saved to output document

HtmlSaveOptionsData.description: container class for html save options

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

AllowNegativeIndent.description: Specifies whether negative left and right indents of paragraphs are allowed (not normalized)

CssStyleSheetFileName.description: Specifies the name of the CSS file written when the document is exported to HTML

CssStyleSheetType.description: Specifies how CSS styles are exported

DocumentSplitCriteria.description: Specifies how the document should be split when saving

DocumentSplitHeadingLevel.description: Specifies the maximum level of headings at which to split the document

Encoding.description: Specifies the encoding to use when exporting

ExportDocumentProperties.description: Specifies whether to export built-in and custom document properties

ExportFontsAsBase64.description: Specifies whether fonts resources should be embedded to HTML in Base64 encoding.  Default is false.

ExportFontResources.description: Specifies whether font resources should be exported

ExportHeadersFootersMode.description: Specifies how headers and footers are output

ExportImagesAsBase64.description: Specifies whether images are saved in Base64 format

ExportLanguageInformation.description: Specifies whether language information is exported

ExportListLabels.description: Controls how list labels are output

ExportMetafileAsRaster.description: Specifies whether to convert metafiles into raster images when exporting

ExportOriginalUrlForLinkedImages.description:
Specifies whether original URL should be used as the URL of the linked images.
Default value is false.

ExportPageMargins.description:
Specifies whether page margins is exported to HTML, MHTML or EPUB.
Default is false.

ExportPageSetup.description: Specifies whether page setup is exported

ExportRelativeFontSize.description: Specifies whether font sizes should be output in relative units when saving

ExportRoundtripInformation.description:
Specifies whether to write the roundtrip information when saving to HTML
Default value is true.

ExportTextBoxAsSvg.description:
Controls how textboxes represented by Aspose.Words.Drawing.Shape are saved to HTML, MHTML or EPUB. Default value is false.
<remarks>
  When set to true, exports textboxes as inline "svg" elements. When false, exports as "image" elements.
</remarks>

ExportTextInputFormFieldAsText.description: Controls how text input form fields are saved

ExportTocPageNumbers.description: Specifies whether to write page numbers to table of contents when saving

ExportXhtmlTransitional.description: Specifies whether to write the DOCTYPE declaration when saving

FontsFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where fonts are saved when exporting a document

FontsFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct font URIs

FontResourcesSubsettingSizeThreshold.description: Controls which font resources need subsetting when saving

HtmlVersion.description:
Specifies version of HTML standard that should be used when saving the document to HTML or MHTML.  
Default value is Aspose.Words.Saving.HtmlVersion.Xhtml.

ImagesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where images are saved when exporting a document

ImagesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs

ImageResolution.description: Specifies the output resolution for images when exporting

OfficeMathOutputMode.description: Controls how OfficeMath objects are exported to HTML, MHTML or EPUB.  Default value is HtmlOfficeMathOutputMode.Image.

ResourceFolder.description: Specifies a physical folder where all resources like images, fonts, and external CSS are saved when a document is exported to HTML. Default is an empty string.

ResourceFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct URIs of all resources written into an HTML document.  Default is an empty string.

ScaleImageToShapeSize.description: Specifies whether images are scaled by Aspose.Words to the bounding shape size when exporting

TableWidthOutputMode.description: Controls how table, row and cell widths are exported

ExportDropDownFormFieldAsText.description:
Controls how drop-down form fields are saved to HTML.
Default value is false.

EpubSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for epub save options.

EpubNavigationMapLevel.description: Specifies the maximum level of headings populated to the navigation map when exporting

FixedPageSaveOptionsData.description: Contains common options that can be specified when saving a document into fixed page formats (PDF, XPS, SWF, images etc).

JpegQuality.description: Determines the quality of the JPEG images inside PDF document.

MetafileRenderingOptions.description: Allows to specify metafile rendering options.

NumeralFormat.description: Indicates the symbol set that is used to represent numbers while rendering to fixed page formats

OptimizeOutput.description:
Flag indicates whether it is required to optimize output of XPS. 
If this flag is set redundant nested canvases and empty canvases are removed, also neighbor glyphs with the same formatting are concatenated. 
Note: The accuracy of the content display may be affected if this property is set to true.  Default is false.

PageCount.description: Determines number of pages to render

PageIndex.description: Determines 0-based index of the first page to render

HtmlFixedSaveOptionsData.description: container class for fixed html save options

CssClassNamesPrefix.description:
Specifies prefix which is added to all class names in style.css file.
Default value is "aw".

ExportEmbeddedCss.description: Specifies whether the CSS (Cascading Style Sheet) should be embedded into Html document.

ExportEmbeddedFonts.description: Specifies whether fonts should be embedded into Html document in Base64 format.

ExportEmbeddedImages.description: Specifies whether images should be embedded into Html document in Base64 format.

ExportFormFields.description: Gets or sets indication of whether form fields are exported as interactive items (as 'input' tag) rather than converted to text or graphics.

ResourcesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where resources are saved when exporting a document

ResourcesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct resource URIs

ShowPageBorder.description: Specifies whether border around pages should be shown.

PageHorizontalAlignment.description:
Specifies the horizontal alignment of pages in an HTML document.
Default value is HtmlFixedHorizontalPageAlignment.Center.

PageMargins.description:
Specifies the margins around pages in an HTML document.
The margins value is measured in points and should be equal to or greater than 0.
Default value is 10 points.

ImageSaveOptionsData.description: Container abstract class for image save options

GraphicsQualityOptions.description: Allows to specify additional System.Drawing.Graphics quality options.

Resolution.description:
Sets both horizontal and vertical resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.
<remarks>
This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.
</remarks>

HorizontalResolution.description:
Gets or sets the horizontal resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.
<remarks>
This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.
</remarks>

VerticalResolution.description:
Gets or sets the vertical resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.
<remarks>
This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.
</remarks>

UseHighQualityRendering.description: Determine whether or not to use high quality (i.e. slow) rendering algorithms

UseAntiAliasing.description: Determine whether or not to use anti-aliasing for rendering

UseGdiEmfRenderer.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether to use GDI+ or Aspose.Words metafile renderer when saving to EMF.

BmpSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for bmp save options.

EmfSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for emf save options.

GifSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for gif save options.

JpegSaveOptionsData.description: container class for jpeg save options.

PngSaveOptionsData.description: container class for png save options.

MhtmlSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for mhtml save options.

OdtSaveOptionsData.description: container class for odt/ott save options

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

IsStrictSchema11.description: Specifies whether export should correspond to ODT specification 1.1 strictly

OoxmlSaveOptionsData.description: container class for docx/docm/dotx/dotm/flatopc save options

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

Compliance.description: Specifies the OOXML version for the output document

Password.description: Specifies a password to encrypt document using ECMA376 Standard encryption algorithm

PclSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for pcl save options

FalllbackFontName.description: Name of the font that will be used if no expected font is found in printer and built-in fonts collections.

RasterizeTransformedElements.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not complex transformed elements should be rasterized before saving to PCL document.  Default is true.

PdfSaveOptionsData.description: container class for pdf save options

BookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the level in the PDF document outline at which to display Word bookmarks

CreateNoteHyperlinks.description:
Specifies whether to convert footnote/endnote references in main text story into active hyperlinks.
When clicked the hyperlink will lead to the corresponding footnote/endnote.
Default is false.

Compliance.description: Specifies the PDF standards compliance level for output documents

DigitalSignatureDetails.description: Specifies the details for signing the output PDF document

DisplayDocTitle.description: A flag specifying whether the windows title bar should display the document title taken from the Title entry of the document information dictionary.

DownsampleImages.description: Specifies whether or not the images should be downsampled

DownsampleResolution.description: Specifies the resolution in pixels per inch to which the images should be downsampled

EmbedFullFonts.description: Controls how fonts are embedded into the resulting PDF documents

EmbedStandardWindowsFonts.description: Determines whether or not to embed standard windows fonts Arial and Times New Roman

EncryptionDetails.description: Specifies the details for encrypting the output PDF document

ExpandedOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels in the PDF document outline to show expanded when the PDF file is viewed

ExportCustomPropertiesAsMetadata.description: Determines whether or not to export custom properties of document as Metadata

ExportDocumentStructure.description: Determines whether or not to export document structure

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the PDF document outline

ImageCompression.description: Specifies compression type to be used for all images in the document

OpenHyperlinksInNewWindow.description: Determines whether hyperlinks in the output Pdf document are forced to be opened in a new window (or tab) of a browser

PageMode.description: Specifies how the PDF document should be displayed when opened in the PDF reader

ImageColorSpaceExportMode.description: Specifies how the color space will be selected for the images in PDF document.

PreserveFormFields.description: Specifies whether to preserve Microsoft Word form fields as form fields in PDF or convert them to text

TextCompression.description: Specifies compression type to be used for all textual content in the document

UseCoreFonts.description: Determines whether or not to substitute TrueType fonts Arial, Times New Roman, Courier New and Symbol with core PDF Type 1 fonts

UseBookFoldPrintingSettings.description: Determines whether the document should be saved using a booklet printing layout

ZoomBehavior.description: Determines what type of zoom should be applied when a document is opened with a PDF viewer

ZoomFactor.description: Determines zoom factor (in percentages) for a document

CustomPropertiesExport.description:
Gets or sets a value determining the way {Aspose.Words.Properties.CustomDocumentProperties} are exported to PDF file.
Default value is {Aspose.Words.Saving.PdfCustomPropertiesExport.None}.

PreblendImages.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not to preblend transparent images with black background color.

PdfDigitalSignatureDetailsData.description: container class for details of digital signature

DownsampleImages.description: Specifies whether images should be downsampled.

Resolution.description: Specifies the resolution in pixels per inch which the images should be downsampled to.

ResolutionThreshold.description:
Specifies the threshold resolution in pixels per inch.
If resolution of an image in the document is less than threshold value, 
the downsampling algorithm will not be applied.
A value of 0 means the threshold check is not used and all images that can be reduced in size are downsampled.

PdfEncryptionDetailsData.description: container class for details of encryption

EncryptionAlgorithm.description: Specifies the encryption algorithm to use

OwnerPassword.description: Specifies the owner password for the encrypted PDF document

Permissions.description: Specifies the operations that are allowed to a user on an encrypted PDF document

UserPassword.description: Specifies the user password required for opening the encrypted PDF document

BookmarksOutlineLevels.description: Allows to specify individual bookmarks outline level

DefaultBookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the default level in the document outline at which to display Word bookmarks

ExpandedOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels in the document outline to show expanded when the file is viewed

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the document outline

BookmarksOutlineLevelData.description: container class for individual bookmarks outline level

PsSaveOptionsData.description: container class for ps save options

UseBookFoldPrintingSettings.description: Determines whether the document should be saved using a booklet printing layout

RtfSaveOptionsData.description: container class for rtf save options

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

ExportCompactSize.description: Allows to make output RTF documents smaller in size, but if they contain RTL (right-to-left) text, it will not be displayed correctly

ExportImagesForOldReaders.description: Specifies whether the keywords for "old readers" are written to RTF or not

SvgSaveOptionsData.description: container class for svg save options

ExportEmbeddedImages.description: Specified whether images should be embedded into SVG document as base64

FitToViewPort.description: Specifies if the output SVG should fill the available viewport area (browser window or container). When set to true width and height of output SVG are set to 100%.

ResourcesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where resources (images) are saved when exporting

ResourcesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs

TextOutputMode.description: Determines how text should be rendered

SwfSaveOptionsData.description: container class for swf save options

BookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the level in the SWF document outline at which to display Word bookmarks

Compressed.description: Specifies whether the generated SWF document should be compressed or not

ExpandedOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels in the SWF document outline to show expanded when the SWF file is viewed

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the SWF document outline

LeftPaneControlFlags.description: Control flags used to configure appearance of left panel of SWF viewer

LogoImageBytes.description: Image that will be displayed as logo in the top right corner of the viewer as string in base64 format

LogoLink.description: Specifies the full hyperlink address for a logo

ShowPageBorder.description: Specifies whether border around pages should be shown

ToolTipsFontName.description: Specifies a font used for tooltips in SWF viewer

TopPaneControlFlags.description: Control flags used to configure appearance of top panel of SWF viewer

ViewerIncluded.description: Specifies whether the generated SWF document should include the integrated document viewer or not

TextSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for text save options.

Encoding.description: Specifies the encoding to use when exporting in plain text format

ExportHeadersFooters.description: Specifies whether to output headers and footers when exporting in plain text format

ForcePageBreaks.description:
Allows to specify whether the page breaks should be preserved during export.
The default value is false.

ParagraphBreak.description: Specifies the string to use as a paragraph break when exporting in plain text format

PreserveTableLayout.description: Specifies whether the program should attempt to preserve layout of tables when saving in the plain text format

SimplifyListLabels.description: Specifies whether the program should simplify list labels in case of complex label formatting not being adequately represented by plain text

WordMLSaveOptionsData.description: container class for wml save options

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

XamlFixedSaveOptionsData.description: container class for xaml fixed save options

ResourcesFolder.description:
Specifies the physical folder where resources (images and fonts) are saved when exporting a document to fixed page Xaml format.
Default is null.

ResourcesFolderAlias.description:
Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs written into an fixed page Xaml document.
Default is null.

XamlFlowSaveOptionsData.description: container class for xaml flow save options

ImagesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where images are saved when exporting

ImagesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs

XpsSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for xps save options.

BookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the level in the XPS document outline at which to display Word bookmarks.

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the XPS document outline.

UseBookFoldPrintingSettings.description: Determines whether the document should be saved using a booklet printing layout

SaveOptionsData.description: base container class for save options data

ColorMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how colors are rendered.
{ Normal | Grayscale}

DmlRenderingMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML shapes are rendered.
{ Fallback | DrawingML }

DmlEffectsRenderingMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML effects are rendered.
{ Simplified | None | Fine }

ZipOutput.description:
Controls zip output or not.
Default value is false.

UpdateSdtContent.description: Gets or sets value determining whether content of {Aspose.Words.Markup.StructuredDocumentTag} is updated before saving.

UpdateFields.description: Gets or sets a value determining if fields should be updated before saving the document to a fixed page format. Default value for this property is true

RunsResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/{paragraphPath}/runs

Runs.description: Represents DTO for collection of runs.

WordsApiLink.description: Provides information for the words api resource link.

Href.description:
The "href" attribute contains the link's IRI. atom:link elements MUST
have an href attribute, whose value MUST be a IRI reference

Rel.description:
atom:link elements MAY have a "rel" attribute that indicates the link
relation type.  If the "rel" attribute is not present, the link
element MUST be interpreted as if the link relation type is "alternate".

Type.description:
On the link element, the "type" attribute's value is an advisory
media type: it is a hint about the type of the representation that is
expected to be returned when the value of the href attribute is
dereferenced.  Note that the type attribute does not override the
actual media type returned with the representation.

Title.description:
The "title" attribute conveys human-readable information about the
link.  The content of the "title" attribute is Language-Sensitive.

RunResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/paragraphs/{0}/runs/{1}

CommentResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/comments/0

RangeStart.description: Link to comment range start node.

RangeEnd.description: Link to comment range end node.

Author.description: Returns or sets the author name for a comment.

Initial.description: Returns or sets the initials of the user associated with a specific comment.

DateTime.description: Gets the date and time that the comment was made.

Text.description: This is a convenience property that allows to easily get or set text of the comment.

DocumentPosition.description: Represents a position in the document tree.

CommentsResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/comments

BorderResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET {nodeWithBorders}/borders.

Border.description: Represents a border of an object.

BorderType.description: Gets or sets the border type.

Color.description: Gets or sets the border color.

DistanceFromText.description: Gets or sets distance of the border from text or from the page edge in points.

LineStyle.description: Gets or sets the border style.

LineWidth.description: Gets or sets the border width in points.

Shadow.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the border has a shadow.

BordersResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET {nodeWithBorders}/borders.

RenderLinks.description: A list of links that originate from this {Aspose.Words.Cloud.DTO.DocumentElements.DrawingObjects.DrawingObjectDto}.

Width.description: Width of the drawing objects in points.

Height.description: Height of the drawing object in points.

OleDataLink.description: Link to ole object. Can be null if shape does not have ole data.

ImageDataLink.description: Link to image data. Can be null if shape does not have an image.

RelativeHorizontalPosition.description: Specifies where the distance to the image is measured from.

Left.description: Distance in points from the origin to the left side of the image.

RelativeVerticalPosition.description: Specifies where the distance to the image measured from.

Top.description: Distance in points from the origin to the top side of the image.

WrapType.description: Specifies how to wrap text around the image.

FieldResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/paragraphs/{0}/fields/{1}

LocaleId.description: Gets or sets LCID of the field.

FieldsResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/{nodePath}/fields

FieldCollection.description: Represents DTO for collection of fields.

FontResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/paragraphs/{0}/runs/{1}/font

AllCaps.description: True if the font is formatted as all capital letters.

Bidi.description: Specifies whether the contents of this run shall have right-to-left characteristics.

Bold.description: True if the font is formatted as bold.

BoldBi.description: True if the right-to-left text is formatted as bold.

Border.description: Border object that specifies border for the font.

Color.description: Gets or sets the color of the font.

ComplexScript.description:
Specifies whether the contents of this run shall be treated as complex script text regardless
of their Unicode character values when determining the formatting for this run.

DoubleStrikeThrough.description: True if the font is formatted as double strikethrough text.

Emboss.description: True if the font is formatted as embossed.

Engrave.description: True if the font is formatted as engraved.

Hidden.description: True if the font is formatted as hidden text.

HighlightColor.description: Gets or sets the highlight (marker) color.

Italic.description: True if the font is formatted as italic.

ItalicBi.description: True if the right-to-left text is formatted as italic.

Kerning.description: Gets or sets the font size at which kerning starts.

LocaleId.description: Gets or sets the locale identifier (language) of the formatted characters.

LocaleIdBi.description: Gets or sets the locale identifier (language) of the formatted right-to-left characters.

LocaleIdFarEast.description: Gets or sets the locale identifier (language) of the formatted Asian characters.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the font

NameAscii.description: Returns or sets the font used for Latin text (characters with character codes from 0 (zero) through 127).

NameBi.description: Returns or sets the name of the font in a right-to-left language document.

NameFarEast.description: Returns or sets an East Asian font name.

NameOther.description: Returns or sets the font used for characters with character codes from 128 through 255.

NoProofing.description: True when the formatted characters are not to be spell checked.

Outline.description: True if the font is formatted as outline.

Position.description:
Gets or sets the position of text (in points) relative to the base line.
A positive number raises the text, and a negative number lowers it.

Scaling.description: Gets or sets character width scaling in percent.

Shadow.description: True if the font is formatted as shadowed.

Size.description: Gets or sets the font size in points.

SizeBi.description: Gets or sets the font size in points used in a right-to-left document.

SmallCaps.description: True if the font is formatted as small capital letters.

Spacing.description: Returns or sets the spacing (in points) between characters.

StrikeThrough.description: True if the font is formatted as strikethrough text.

StyleIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the locale independent style identifier of the character style applied to this formatting.

StyleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the character style applied to this formatting.

Subscript.description: True if the font is formatted as subscript.

Superscript.description: True if the font is formatted as superscript.

TextEffect.description: Gets or sets the font animation effect.

Underline.description: Gets or sets the type of underline applied to the font.

UnderlineColor.description: Gets or sets the color of the underline applied to the font.

Position.description: Link to comment range start node.

FootnoteType.description: Returns a value that specifies whether this is a footnote or endnote.

ReferenceMark.description:
Gets/sets custom reference mark to be used for this footnote.
Default value is {System.String.Empty}, meaning auto-numbered footnotes are used.

Text.description: This is a convenience property that allows to easily get or set text of the footnote.

FormFieldCollection.description: Represents DTO for collection of formfields.

IsCheckBoxExactSize.description: Gets or sets the boolean value that indicates whether the size of the textbox is automatic or specified explicitly.

CheckBoxSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the checkbox in points. Has effect only when {Aspose.Words.Cloud.DTO.DocumentElements.FormFields.FormFieldCheckbox.IsCheckBoxExactSize} is true.

Checked.description: Gets or sets the checked status of the check box form field.

DropDownSelectedIndex.description: Gets or sets the index specifying the currently selected item in a dropdown form field.

DropDownItems.description: Provides access to the items of a dropdown form field.

TextInputFormat.description: Returns or sets the text formatting for a text form field.

TextInputType.description: Gets or sets the type of a text form field.

TextInputDefault.description: Gets or sets the default string or a calculation expression of a text form field.

MaxLength.description: Maximum length for the text field. Zero when the length is not limited.

Name.description: Gets or sets the form field name.

Enabled.description: True if a form field is enabled.

StatusText.description: Returns or sets the text that's displayed in the status bar when a form field has the focus.

OwnStatus.description: Specifies the source of the text that's displayed in the status bar when a form field has the focus.

HelpText.description: Returns or sets the text that's displayed in a message box when the form field has the focus and the user presses F1.

OwnHelp.description: Specifies the source of the text that's displayed in a message box when a form field has the focus and the user presses F1.

CalculateOnExit.description: True if references to the specified form field are automatically updated whenever the field is exited.

EntryMacro.description: Returns or sets an entry macro name for the form field.

ExitMacro.description: Returns or sets an exit macro name for the form field.

DisplayType.description:
Gets/sets Office Math display format type which represents whether an equation is displayed inline with the text
or displayed on its own line.

MathObjectType.description: Gets type Aspose.Words.Math.OfficeMath.MathObjectType of this Office Math object.

SectionPageSetupResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/sections/{0}/PageSetup

PageSetup.description: Represents the page setup properties of a section.

Bidi.description: Specifies that this section contains bidirectional (complex scripts) text.

BorderAlwaysInFront.description: Specifies where the page border is positioned relative to intersecting texts and objects.

BorderAppliesTo.description: Specifies which pages the page border is printed on.

BorderDistanceFrom.description:
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the specified page border is measured from the edge of the page or from
the text it surrounds.

BottomMargin.description:
Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the bottom edge of the page and the bottom boundary of the body
text.

DifferentFirstPageHeaderFooter.description: True if a different header or footer is used on the first page.

FirstPageTray.description:
Gets or sets the paper tray (bin) to use for the first page of a section.
The value is implementation (printer) specific.

FooterDistance.description: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the footer and the bottom of the page.

Gutter.description: Gets or sets the amount of extra space added to the margin for document binding.

HeaderDistance.description: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the header and the top of the page.

LeftMargin.description: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the left edge of the page and the left boundary of the body text.

LineNumberCountBy.description: Returns or sets the numeric increment for line numbers.

LineNumberDistanceFromText.description: Gets or sets distance between the right edge of line numbers and the left edge of the document.

LineNumberRestartMode.description:
Gets or sets the way line numbering runs  that is, whether it starts over at the beginning of a new
page or section or runs continuously.

LineStartingNumber.description: Gets or sets the starting line number.

Orientation.description: Returns or sets the orientation of the page.

OtherPagesTray.description:
Gets or sets the paper tray (bin) to be used for all but the first page of a section.
The value is implementation (printer) specific.

PageHeight.description: Returns or sets the height of the page in points.

PageNumberStyle.description: Gets or sets the page number format.

PageStartingNumber.description: Gets or sets the starting page number of the section.

PageWidth.description: Returns or sets the width of the page in points.

PaperSize.description: Returns or sets the paper size.

RestartPageNumbering.description: True if page numbering restarts at the beginning of the section.

RightMargin.description:
Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the right edge of the page and the right boundary of the body
text.

RtlGutter.description:
Gets or sets whether Microsoft Word uses gutters for the section based on a right-to-left language or a
left-to-right language.

SectionStart.description: Returns or sets the type of section break for the specified object.

SuppressEndnotes.description: True if endnotes are printed at the end of the next section that doesn't suppress endnotes. Suppressed endnotes are printed before the endnotes in that section.

TopMargin.description: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the top edge of the page and the top boundary of the body text.

VerticalAlignment.description: Returns or sets the vertical alignment of text on each page in a document or section.

This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:

TableCellFormat.description: Represents all formatting for a table row.

BottomPadding.description: Returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add below the contents of cell.

FitText.description: If true, fits text in the cell, compressing each paragraph to the width of the cell.

HorizontalMerge.description: Specifies how the cell is merged horizontally with other cells in the row.

LeftPadding.description: Returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the left of the contents of cell.

Orientation.description: Returns or sets the orientation of text in a table cell.

PreferredWidth.description: Returns or sets the preferred width of the cell.

RightPadding.description: Returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the right of the contents of cell.

TopPadding.description: Returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add above the contents of cell.

VerticalAlignment.description: Returns or sets the vertical alignment of text in the cell.

VerticalMerge.description: Specifies how the cell is merged with other cells vertically.

Width.description: Gets the width of the cell in points.

WrapText.description: If true, wrap text for the cell.

Type.description: Gets the unit of measure used for this preferred width value.

Value.description: Gets or sets the preferred width value. The unit of measure is specified in the {Aspose.Words.Cloud.DTO.DocumentElements.Tables.PreferredWidthDto.Type} property.

This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:

TablePropertiesResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}/properties

Alignment.description: Specifies how an inline table is aligned in the document.

AllowAutoFit.description: Allows Microsoft Word and Aspose.Words to automatically resize cells in a table to fit their contents.

Bidi.description: Gets or sets whether this is a right-to-left table.

BottomPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add below the contents of cells.

CellSpacing.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) between the cells.

LeftIndent.description: Gets or sets the value that represents the left indent of the table.

LeftPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the left of the contents of cells.

PreferredWidth.description:
Gets or sets the table preferred width. 
<para>Preferred width can be specified as a percentage, number of points or a special "auto" value.</para>

RightPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the right of the contents of cells.

StyleIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the locale independent style identifier of the table style applied to this table.

StyleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the table style applied to this table.

StyleOptions.description: Gets or sets bit flags that specify how a table style is applied to this table.

TextWrapping.description: Get or sets TextWrapping {Aspose.Words.Cloud.DTO.DocumentElements.Tables.TablePropertiesDto.TextWrapping} for table.

TopPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add above the contents of cells.

TableResponse.description:
This resonse should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v1.1/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}

RowFormat.description: Provides access to the formatting properties of the row.

TableRowFormat.description: Represents all formatting for a table row.

Height.description: Gets or sets the height of the table row in points.

HeightRule.description: Gets or sets the rule for determining the height of the table row.

AllowBreakAcrossPages.description: True if the text in a table row is allowed to split across a page break.

HeadingFormat.description: True if the row is repeated as a table heading on every page when the table spans more than one page.

Value.description: String value of the document property.

BuiltIn.description:
Flag indicates whether the property is built-in or not.
If true the property is built-in, if false the property is custom.

Links.description: A list of links that originate from this document.

FileName.description: Gets the name of the file.

SourceFormat.description: Gets the original format of the document.

IsEncrypted.description: Returns true if the document is encrypted and requires a password to open.

IsSigned.description:
Returns true if the document contains a digital signature. This property merely informs that a 
digital signature is present on a document, but it does not specify whether the signature is valid or not.

Link.description:
Provides information for the object link.
This is supposed to be an atom:link, therefore it should have all attributes specified here http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287#section-4.2.7

Href.description:
The "href" attribute contains the link's IRI. atom:link elements MUST
have an href attribute, whose value MUST be a IRI reference

Rel.description:
atom:link elements MAY have a "rel" attribute that indicates the link
relation type.  If the "rel" attribute is not present, the link
element MUST be interpreted as if the link relation type is "alternate".

Type.description:
On the link element, the "type" attribute's value is an advisory
media type: it is a hint about the type of the representation that is
expected to be returned when the value of the href attribute is
dereferenced.  Note that the type attribute does not override the
actual media type returned with the representation.

Title.description:
The "title" attribute conveys human-readable information about the
link.  The content of the "title" attribute is Language-Sensitive.

FieldNames.description: Represents a collection of merge fields within a document.

ProtectionDataResponse.description: Response for the request of data about protection

ProtectionData.description: Container for the data about protection of the document

ProtectionResponse.description: Response for the request on changing protection of the document

ProtectionResult.description: Result of the changing of protection

Matches.description: Number of occurrences of the captured text in the document.

RevisionsModificationResponse.description: response of the modification operations for the revisions collection (now these are acceptAll and rejectAll)

Result.description: result of the modification operations for the revisions collection

ModificationOperationResult.description: result of the operation which modifies the original document and saves the result

Source.description: Link to the source document (source for the modification operation)

Dest.description: Link to the dest document (result of the modification operation)

SearchingPattern.description: A regular expression pattern used to find matches.

RangeStart.description: Link to result range start node.

RangeEnd.description: Link to result range end node.

StatDataResponse.description: Response for the request of the document's statistical data

DocumentStatData.description: Container for the document's statistical data

WordCount.description: Total count of words in the document

ParagraphCount.description: Total count of paragraphs in the document

PageCount.description: Total count of pages in the document

FootnotesStatData.description: Container for the footnotes statistical data

WordCount.description: Total count of words in footnotes

ParagraphCount.description: Total count of paragraphs in footnotes

PageStatData.description: Container for the page's statistical data

WordCount.description: Total count of words in the page

ParagraphCount.description: Total count of paragraphs in the page

PageNumber.description: Class is used for insert page number request building.

Alignment.description: Text alignment, possible values are left, right, center or justify.

IsTop.description: If true the page number is added at the top of the page, else at the bottom.

SetPageNumberOnFirstPage.description: If true the page number is added on first page too.

Postion.description: Table will be inserted before specified position.

InsertAfter.description: Table row will be inserted after row with specified 0-based index.
Table cell will be inserted after cell with specified 0-based index.

ReplaceTextRequest.description: Class for document replace text request building.

OldValue.description: Old text value (or regex pattern {Aspose.Words.Cloud.DTO.Replace.ReplaceTextRequest.IsOldValueRegex}) to replace.

NewValue.description: New text value to replace by.

IsMatchCase.description: Flag, true means the search is case-sensitive; false means the search is not case-sensitive.

IsMatchWholeWord.description: Flag, means that only whole word matched are replaced.

IsOldValueRegex.description: Flag, means that {Aspose.Words.Cloud.DTO.Replace.ReplaceTextRequest.OldValue} contains regex expression.

WatermarkText.description: Class for insert watermark text request building.

ComparingWithDocument.description: Path to document to compare at the server.

Author.description: Initials of the author to use for revisions.

DateTime.description: The date and time to use for revisions.

LoadWebDocumentData.description: Contains data for load web document
